name: RizzPAWN
description:
Are you having troubles with life? Do you have no significant other? Fear not, now you can be a gigachad pawn!

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Movement

Space - Ability

A, S, D, F - Swap Chess Piece

Esc - Quick Restart

Irfan Fadilah Rafif as Project Manager
Aryadeeva Ma'ruf Baihaqi as Lead Programmer
Reynard Pradhitya as Sound Designer
Daniel Ardi Chandra as Graphic Designer
